name: OBERON AVIATION SERVICES PTY LTD
about: Oberon Aviation Services Pty Ltd, trading as Flight Training Centre, is a CASA approved Part 141 Flying School located in Albury Wodonga. As an Australian-owned institution, we specialize in providing high-quality flight training and charter services. Our purpose-built facility is designed to offer comprehensive training programs that combine hands-on flight instruction with theoretical study. Students master instrument flight procedures, precision approaches, and advanced navigation techniques. We are committed to fostering aspiring pilots with a rigorous and supportive learning environment, ensuring they are well-prepared for their aviation careers. With a strong focus on safety and excellence, Oberon Aviation Services is dedicated to helping students achieve their flying aspirations.
services:
["Recreational Pilot Licence
Private Pilot Licence
Commercial Pilot Licence
Flight Instructor Rating
Multi Engine Rating
Licence upgrades"]
